price: (Èṣù) wí pé: “Fún wí pé O ti fi mí sínú anù, èmi yóò jókòó dè wọ́n ní ọ̀nà tààrà Rẹ.
arabic: قَالَ فَبِمَآ أَغۡوَيۡتَنِي لَأَقۡعُدَنَّ لَهُمۡ صِرَٰطَكَ ٱلۡمُسۡتَقِيمَ

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: qāla fabimā aghwaytanī la-aqʿudanna lahum ṣirāṭaka al-mus'taqīma
